<%-post.title %>

<%=post.author.name %> <%=post.date %>
<% post.blocks.forEach(function(block){ switch (block.type) { case 'img' : %>
<%if(block.description){%>
<%-block.description%>
<%}%> <%if(block.credits){%>
<%-block.credits.content%>
<%} %>
<% break; case 'text' : %>

<%-block.content%>

<% break; case 'yt-embed' : %>
<% break; case 'tt-embed' : %>
<% break; } })%>
<% ads.forEach(function(adItem, i){ if(adItem.squarePicture.url != ""){%> "> <%} })%>
<% posts.forEach(function(postItem, i){ %> <%if(postItem.id !== post.id){ if(posts[0].id != post.id){%> " title="<%-postItem.title%>" href="https://qgda30.herokuapp.com/<%=postItem.slug%>">
<%-postItem.title%>
<%=postItem.author.name%> <%=postItem.date%>
<%-postItem.briefContent%>
<%}else{%> " title="<%=postItem.title%>" href="https://qgda30.herokuapp.com/<%=postItem.slug%>">
<%=postItem.title%>
<%=postItem.author.name%> <%=postItem.date%>
<%-postItem.briefContent%>
<%} } })%>
